formdata.value: Which data structure follows the FIFO principle?
Queue follows the FIFO (First In First Out) principle.

body.raw:
{
    "type": "MCQ",
    "difficulty": "INTERMEDIATE",
    "questionText": "Which law demo demo demo of thermodynamics states energy cannot be created or destroyed?",
    "options": [
        "First Law demo",
        "Second Law demo",
        "Third Law demo",
        "Zeroth Law demo"
    ],
    "correctOption": 1,
    "marks": 2,
    "solutionText": "The First Law of Thermodynamics states that energy is conserved."
}

formdata.value: Explain the process management functions of an operating system.

Process management involves creating, scheduling, and terminating processes. The operating system manages CPU allocation, process synchronization, inter-process communication, and deadlock handling to ensure efficient execution of programs.

item.name: Add Fill In The Blanks Question

formdata.value: The brain of the computer is the _____ and it performs all _____ operations.
The CPU is known as the brain of the computer and it performs all processing operations.
